questions.question: What is the portfolio-site project about?
questions.notes: Direct lookup — both should handle fine

questions.question: What language is the pokemon-api written in?
What does the crypto-web-component do?
questions.notes: Direct lookup from one repo README

questions.question: What framework does the shopping-list-t3 project use?
Which projects use Angular, and how do they differ in purpose?
questions.notes: Requires finding multiple repos, comparing them

questions.question: How does the developer's experience with Kotlin differ between the NasaPictureOfTheDay and TodoApp projects?
What backend technologies has the developer used across all projects?
questions.notes: Requires aggregating info from multiple repos

questions.question: Compare the authentication approaches used in MEANAuthApp vs MEANAuthAppAngular.
questions.notes: Must retrieve and compare two specific repos

questions.question: What should I look at if I want to see this developer's best work?
questions.notes: Subjective — agent can check stars, recency, descriptions

questions.question: Is this developer experienced enough for a full-stack role?
questions.notes: Requires synthesizing across many repos and technologies

questions.question: What areas could this developer improve in based on their portfolio?
questions.notes: Requires broad analysis — agent can explore, RAG gets noisy

questions.question: Which project has the most stars, and what is it about?
questions.notes: Agent can use live GitHub API; RAG only sees static READMEs
